name: Totally Not Mario
description:
Mario is tired of jumping. In the modern age, a new solution has arisen to solve old world problems. Jumping is in the past. Bullets and gunpowder are the future.

Hello everyone, thank you for taking to time to check out my game. This is my first game project ever and I'm really excited to begin developing future ideas and concepts. Apologies in advance for any bugs you may encounter while running this game and your patience is much appreciated. 

Hints: A certain collision between the player and a block will allow the player to jump higher than usual.

Credits:

Programming/ Visual FX/ UI design by graymond

Art, Music, and Sound Design by Roman Borje

Shoutout to Brackeys, Expat Studios, and Pandemonium on Youtube
